content: How can we say that a physician has a role as a Specialist for a Care Team 1, and the role of Counselling for a Care Team 2?
BTW, http://hl7.org/fhir/careteam gives an error, http://hl7.org/fhir/careteam.html is ok. Is this fixable?
Did you look at the IHE profile on Care Team Management?
@Emma Jones can you help Jose?
Hi Jose, isn't CareTeam.participant.role what you are searching about ?

yes, participant.role for the specialist and participant.member to say who the physician is. If you need to say that the physician on the care team is a specialist at a specific location, use participant,practiionerRole.
